reviews.review: Worst movie ever. I believe it saved me money in the long run because I have no desire to see any of the actors that were in this movie in any movie. I wish I could have my three hours back but will have to suffice by never watching them again.
Good action, and our favorite charactersâ€”but a horrible ill-conceived script. One star for poor long-winded storytelling and a contrived plot. Meh
Sacrifice. Love. Death. Superheroes. All you could ask for in a drama, action, and war movie.
Just shows Disney can make a good film . Unlike the last jedi which was the biggest pile of crap I've ever seen in my life.
I tought the movie would seem super long but its so good it flew by. Loved the movie

It's a sad indictment of where moviemaking is nowadays that several reviewers here thought this was a masterpiece and the best film ever made !!    I suppose it is a movie for the playstation/Xbox generation where snazzy visuals are all that matter.  This is basically a cartoon intercut with live action scenes. Tom Holland being interviewed on the Graham Norton show even said that in certain scenes he filmed that he had no idea what was going on and no idea who else was even in the scene with him. That says it all really. An overlong, convoluted mess on a movie. One of the many places we go to on our whirlwind tour of the Marvel universe is a place called 'Knowwhere' which is where this shambles quickly goes.Tripe such as this, Wonder Woman and The Last Jedi prove that the art of great movie storytelling has been lost. Sad, very sad.

It's okay and good fun so worth watching. The ratings will eventually settle down around the 60% mark. 

Best bit IMO:

Thanos: you should have gone for the head

Thor: yeeees but this is the world of Disney and as much as that's what I would do in the real world given how nasty you've been, I can't as then we lose the revenue from children's tickets and there'd be no sequel.
Not crazy about the movie. It tried too hard to include too many people. It lacked continuity, it lacked logic, and it lacked adequate character development.
Good characters, under developed because of all the chaos. Another chaotic Avengers movie. Very predictable.

Unlike other recent blockbusters by other companies, I was surprised and not angry at the studio. The emotional impact on the audience had meaning and advanced the story. The humor, while hokey at times, works because it's established and the characters have good chemistry and have excellent timing for delivery of the serious and comedic lines. In short, one of the best MCU movies to date. My issue with the movie is simply the ending. It lacks emotional weight and I don't think will stand the test of time because every knows this isn't the end.
